text: @SenateGOP @realDonaldTrump RT! Three months after the nation’s first confirmed case, the highly contagious virus has killed at an alarming rate: Just 10 DAYS AGO, the number of recorded deaths stood at 25,000. https://t.co/kRxStHXikz
